What part of "see you in an hour" wasn't clear?

Becky, I think you're -- Balthazar WHISPERS something and --
-- a total fraud.

I'm serious! Sure, you act all nice as long as I'm doing you a favor, getting your little radio show back on the air --

-- but come on, I'm just a dork, right? The guy with the big "D" on his chest?!

It's better this way. Don't ask me how I know. I just do.
You...you did that! Why?! (steps back) Don't come near me!!! (MORE)

Dave --
Dave sees the ENCANTUS on the table. He waves his hand an the book FLIPS OPEN, the pages turning until we see -- The "LIVES OF THE SORCERERS," the entry for VERONICA FLOO

Dave, don't...STOP! As Balthazar lunges, Dave throws his hand up and Balthaza slows to 1/20th speed! SPEED BUMP.

Took you ten years to learn that, huh?! (points at himself) Prime Merlinean! Dave puts his hand on the book, closes his eyes and -- BOOM!!! AURELIUS FLOOD and VERONICA stand side-by-side, staring w grave determination as -- BALTHAZAR -- blocks the door, stares menacingly at Aureli and Veronica. PLASMA BOLTS form around his clenched fists
Time for you to go, old man. Aurelius shakes his head, smiles.
When will you Morganians ever learn?

WHAT                        ! Dave stares in shock as -- Balthazar throws a PLASMA BOLT and Aurelius and Veronica to the air, conjuring BOLTS of their own. As a full-on SORCERER BATTLE erupts in the shop, we --
Dave rips his trembling hand from the page.

Oh my god...it was all a lie... (turns to Balthazar) Who are you?! Balthazar struggles against the SUPER SLO-MO that's ensna him. It takes everything he's got to -- TEAR HIMSELF FREE! Balthazar hits the ground at full spee rolls behind a lab console to dodge the -- SALVO OF PLASMA BOLTS -- that Dave is throwing at him.

Dave, stop! -- Dave isn't hearing him. Balthazar ducks for cover, touche his hand to the floor and -- . THE FLOOR AT DAVE'S FEET -- suddenly LIQUEFIES, turning i a POOL OF WATER that Dave plunges into.

Whoa! UNDERWATER -- Dave flails up toward the light when he see his WATCH MORPHING on his wrist, transforming into -- A STEEL SHACKLE. And at the other end of the chain: A CINDERBLOCK! Dave's eyes go wide as the last bubbles of air jettison from his lungs and he is dragged down toward blackness seemingly without end. As Dave reaches up toward the fading light -- A HAND SNAT HIS WRIST. Balthazar hoists Dave out of the water, throws him to the floor against a lab console.
Dave COUGHS violently, catches his breath, looks up at Balthazar standing over him.
I want. The truth. Despite what just happened, there's not an ounce of conce in Dave's eyes. But the truth is something Balthazar seem unwilling or unable to go near.
"Life shrinks or expands," remember? Well, from where I'm standing, you've got yourself a little shrinkage problem.
You're sitting, you little jerk.
I need to hear it. You need to say” it. So what happened? Finally Balthazar exhales, and after years of keeping thi pent up inside...
I was a Morganian, trained in the Dark Arts from the time I was a boy. Fifteen years ago Horvath sent me on a mission: to steal the Grimhold...and kill Aurelius Flood.
(nods) The battle I saw in the Encantus.
(smiles at the memory) Only you didn't see how it ended.
QUICK CUTS -- The shop is demolished. Aurelius's shoulder bleeding as he and Veronica stand over a battered, semi- conscious Balthazar.
Let's just say Aurelius and Veronica put a serious beat-down on yours truly. They could've killed me...
- Balthazar lies in bed, his wrists bound to the bedposts Aurelius and Veronica bring him some breakfast.
-.-instead they took me in, nursed me back to health. - Time has passed. Aurelius talks to Balthazar late into night, the shop illuminated by FLICKERING CANDLES.

They taught me there's no such thing as good magic or bad. The magic is neutral -- it's what's in a sorcerer's heart that matters. And when my heart began to change... - Balthazar and Veronica stand behind the display case, talking, smiling -- falling deeply in love.
.--let's just say my old pals weren't so thrilled.

FAST, BLURRY IMPRESSIONS -- A BATTLE takes place in a dri rainstorm. Balthazar, Aurelius and Veronica face off agai Horvath, Sun Lok, Menmet-Ra, and others who remain obscur LIGHTNING flashes as Horvath and Aurelius clash.

In the heat of the battle, Horvath managed to get Merlin's ring from Aurelius. For the first time in a thousand years... THE INNERMOST DOLL —-- flies open and an unforgettable si emerges -- the MONSTROUS SPECTRAL SPIRIT of Morgana le Fa
---Morgana's spirit was free. MORGANA'S SPIRIT expands rapidly in size and energy. Vero SCREAMS as she is caught up in this maelstrom.
I've got to hand it to Aurelius. He moved fast, before she got too powerful...

Aurelius lifts his hand and the DRAGON RING leaps off Horvath's hand and onto Aurelius's. A wave of the old man hand rips the Grimhold open, unleashing -- A VORTEX OF ENERGY that encircles Morgana and the Morgani With a final surge of magic that will kill him --

text: MOMENTS LATER -- Balthazar kneels beside the dying Aureli who places MERLIN'S RING in Balthazar's hand.
And Veronica...?
Balthazar looks up, still feeling the pain of that moment
I lost her. Dave can see how devastated Balthazar still is.
As sorcerers we're supposed to lead solitary lives, to put sorcery before love, self -- everything. I tried to have both, love and sorcery. What I got is a pain I've carried since the day I lost her.
(realizes) You were trying to spare me from that, by driving Becky away. (then) Why is the Alchemy of the Heart in the center of the circle? Balthazar says nothing.

For the same reason your powers appeared on the day you fell for Becky. Love is the most powerful source of a sorcerer's magic. If he can tap it, he can't be stopped, but if he tries...he just might lose the love of his life.
Dave thinks about this, turns to Balthazar.
Or he might win her. Their eyes meet. Perhaps each man has now taught somethin and each one learned, but a glimmer of hope -- for what, can't be sure -- shines in Balthazar's eyes. He nods.
Let's go find your girl.

Becky gazes at the painting, shakes her head and walks ou MOMENTS LATER -- Becky meanders through a sculpture galle when a VOICE comes over the P.A.

Can you help me? I lost my dad! He was right next to me then all of a sudden I couldn't find him!
Okay, don't worry...
Becky looks for a guard but there are none around. The gi is on the verge of tears.
I'm gonna help you, okay? We'll find him together.
Oh, thank you!
He's prob'ly going crazy looking for you. Where was the last place you saw him?
This way... The girl leads Becky out of the gallery and down a corrid She takes Becky's hand, flashes a relieved smile.
My name's Abbie. I'm from Massachusetts.
Don't worry, Abbie. We'll find him.
Dave leads Balthazar through the museum.
How do you know she'll be here? Did you put a tracking spell on her? Dave arrives at THE CHAGALL. He gazes at the painting, smiles at the memory.

Something like that. Dave scans the room, looking left and right. At the far e of the museum he sees Becky just as she and Abbie duck ar a corner and disappear. Balthazar smiles at Dave: 'Go get her.' But as Dave runs off, Balthazar spins around -- SENSES SOMETHING.
The drone of MACHINERY and the exposed conduit on the wal gives us the sense that this is a utility corridor.  86.

We found him! Becky turns to see Abbie, smiling demonically as her clot transform from jeans and a t-shirt into a 17th century BL PURITAN DRESS and HEAD SCARF, TO REVEAL -- The last Morganian and the Original Creepy As Hell Little Girl -- ABIGAIL WILLIAMS. Becky's scream dies in her lungs as Chernabog snatches he by the throat, pulls her up to his GLOWING DEMONIC EYES.

Dave runs around the corner into the UTILITY CORRIDOR, th around the next corner where Becky was just a moment ago. At the end of the hall a STEEL DOOR swings the last coupl inches, and SHUTS. Where the heck is she going?

A CONCUSSION BLAST nails Balthazar, sends him skidding ac the floor into a massive BOILER -- out cold. The MECHANICAL ROOM beneath the museum is a 70-year-old c of PUMPS, PIPING, BOILERS, GENERATORS and HVAC EQUIPMENT.
Dave is in agony on the concrete floor, having met the sa welcome a moment before. He looks up, sees Maxim..

Boy, did you guys take the bait. +.-then Abigail, and finally Chernabog, holding the terri Becky in his clutches. Dave stares in shock. He's seen some weird sh*t in the la 72 hours, but nothing like Chernabog.
You're wondering how we got here... Horvath nods toward a shadowy corner and an ancient, out- service ELEVATOR, its art deco doors draped with cobwebs.

A portal, installed .in the thirties by your Master's Master's Master. It can be used to travel across the dimensions, or within them. ‘ (off Chernabog) Cabs just won't stop for him. Chernabog utters a low, monstrous GROWL.
Say hello to Chernabog, Conjurer of Souls...and this is Abigail Williams. Abigail smiles rather sweetly. Dave sees Balthazar starti to come to. Dave gets to his feet, trying to buy some tim

Oh, boy. Prob'ly shouldn't have said that. Abigail starts walking toward Dave. Dave takes a step bac

Dave stares in horror as ABIGAIL'S MOUTH opens at a grote 90 degree angle and -- A SWARM OF BATS comes flying out! Dave SCREAMS as the bats swarm him, pummelling him. I wouldn't play with fire, scarecrow. (off Chernabog) Not with that guy in the room. Horvath nods and the SWARM OF BATS and the HELLFIRE BAT disappear. Dave falls to the ground on his back, opens hi eyes to see Horvath standing over him.

You have something that belongs to me. THE DRAGON RING -- almost seems to recoil as Horvath reac down to pluck it from Dave's finger. But Horvath is a Pri Merlinean. The dragon has no choice as Horvath takes the ring and SLIPS IT ON HIS FINGER. ACROSS THE ROOM -- Balthazar struggles to his knees.
No... Horvath grins, reaches into his coat and pulls out -- THE INNERMOST DOLL. MORGANA LE FAY stares out at us, a chilling medieval rendering of the dark sorceress.
Balthazar lunges at Horvath, but Horvath -- his power magnified by Merlin's ring -- throws out his hand and sen Balthazar flying into the wall, pinning him there.
Relax, Blake. Enjoy the show.

THE MORGANA NESTING DOLL -- hovers in mid-air, held aloft tendrils of DARK ENERGY that Horvath has conjured. Abigai and Chernabog look on. Balthazar is pinned against the wall; Dave and Becky are to stand together. Things look bleak.
Becky, those things I said before...that wasn't me. But Becky is beyond terrified.

THE NESTING DOLL -- starts to GROW, and buckle outward, n resembling a giant egg -- or more accurately an EGG SAC, because its outer shell is no longer hard but malleable.. AND THERE'S SOMETHING INSIDE -- TRYING TO GET OUT. THE EGG SAC -- bends in places, stretches out in the shap a hand, a head. We are witnessing a sickening birth. Balthazar shakes with emotion. Horv smiles at his Queen.
Morgana, you're free... Morgana smiles, draws her lips close to Horvath's -- and BITCH-SLAPS HIM. Blood trickles from Horvath's lip.

(off Dave and Becky) And these?
She's a citizen. He's the Prime Merlinean, if you can believe it. Morgana takes Dave's chin, examining him. Shakes her head
